>     Adrax sneered. He didnt like the idea of being controlled, by anyone.
He
> stood up and took a good look at himself. He looked the same in warrior
mode
> as he did in his past life. The only wepon he could account for was a
> grapling gun. It was large, bulky, but very effective.
>     He transformed into his demonic centiped beast mode. It looked the
same
> as well. He hoovered in the air, his mouth full of jagged teeth and the
> grappling gun opened and closed, and the spikes that covered his body
flexed
> and pulsed.
>     "I dont suppose this is to bad after all, Autofire. Whoever this Vok
is,
> it knows its weponry." He said, cruising in the hot air.
>     Useing his eight bug eyes, Adrax scanned the area for miles ahead. He
got
> the direction of the Predacon base, and with Autofire, began the journey.
>
>
>
